info_CN: 减论Agent通过算法为您推荐
香港科技大学、香港大学及艾弗琳人工智能提出了PhysHPO方法
通过分层细粒度的跨模态直接偏好优化
实现基于实例、状态、运动和语义四个层级的物理合理视频生成及自动化优质数据筛选
The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
and University of Central Florida presented PhysHPO
a framework for Hierarchical Cross-Modal Direct Preference Optimization that aligns video generation preferences across instance
and semantic levels while incorporating an automated data selection pipeline to enhance physical plausibility in videos
